website_summaries.verdict: A very thick breast milk storage bag that does a good job of not leaking.
pros: Tear off top to keep bags sterilized until you use
Comes with a toxic free pen for labeling
Stack for storage in the freezer
Accurate ounce measure on the label
cons: Bags do not stand on their own
They are also not the largest bags available

customer_reviews.title: Not at all worth the hefty price. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Pouring out of bags containing 5 oz or more is highly cumbersome. Also bags that full don't stack upon freezing and slide all around. Certainly not buying again. Read all the raving reviews and decided to give these very expensive bags a try... Pros: - Decent calibration - Not flimsy - Possible to pump into bag with papablic adapter for S2. Its clumsy but doable. Cons: - Double the price - Noisy - Stiff opening - Hard to pour milk out - Small label. No space to write quantity which is needed since it's impossible to tell how much the bag holds once frozen.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Made In Communist China--misleading packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. Don't be the lies on the box!! Very misleading design on the box.. American flag logo on the outside but 100% Chinese made just like others!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage, still haven't figured out the best way to pour out.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Medela Pump in Style pump and pump into the bottles, then pour into the bags. Maybe not the most efficient system, but the Medela pump-compatible bags have only so-so reviews. These bags are nice and sturdy; I have yet to have one overflow or crack/leak in the freezer. My only issue is that I haven't figured out the best way to pour out the milk once I defrost them. So far cutting off the top, putting the bag through a bottle neck, and inverting seems to minimize loss. But the bags themselves are great for my needs as a busy student trying to keep my breast milk supply going.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Li

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Pros:- Don’t occupy much space in freezer Marker is very helpful Cons:- the ziplock is too tight Markings are not clear Can’t pour the milk into bottle without spilling because of the design of the cover.. Overall I don’t recommend this product.. very expensive and not useful
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Thick bags, don’t leak, but don’t store as flat
customer_reviews.text: High quality thick bags. I’ve been using them for about half a year (exclusively pumping so they get lots of use) and never had a leak. They are much thicker than other major brands. The drawback though is they don’t store as flat as the other ones, so they do take up more space. You can make a “brick” of ~60oz (10x6oz bags) in a gallon ziplock usually with Lansinoh but only about a 40-50oz “brick” with this one. Worth it though if you have the space and want the peace of mind that it won’t leak!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: I had to return the bags because of a smell ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the bags because of a smell inside that got in the milk. My baby actually threw up my breast milk and I freaked out! I open the milk bag and sure enough there is a strong chemical odor. I think it's whatever they use to sterilize the bag prior to shipping. I would just rather have non-sterilized baggies and no smell, thank you! The company did return my money when I emailed them which is why they get 2 stars instead of 1. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: I prefer over other brands!
customer_reviews.text: I was given some medela bags as a baby shower gift and thought they were good until I started using these! In comparison the bona fide baby bags are thicker, hold more and have an easier seal. The labeling system is larger then on most brands which makes it easier to keep the tons of milk I have in the freezer organized. I will continue to use this product as long as I have a need and will recommend/gift in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: bought these breastmilk bags and i use them on the daily. they can hold about 5oz maybe 6oz of milk. havent had any issues with them leaking. i simply pump, fill, then place in freezer flat. when ready to use, i run warm water on the bag to defrost the milk before transferring it to a bottle to feed the baby.
customer_reviews.author: min2be

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this milk storage bag
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this milk storage bag! I love that it came with the marker for your storage bags!! That's a very big plus to me since its so convienent. The bags have never leaked on me and the quality is very good. I've had milk storage bags that were too lightweight that it felt flimsy but not this one! It holds its own. The measurement that's on the bags itself is a little off so you may want to write the oz on the bag somewhere to be sure exactly what oz is in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They work well
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They work well. Stand up and won't fall over which is nice for fridge storage. They can lay flat for freezing to take up less space. Made in the USA. The volume marking on the bag are off FYI but whatever. I haven't found anything that is correct except the bottles I pump into. Not a big concern for me. It is difficult sometimes to pour the milk out into the bottle, we spilled milk multiple times. That could be our error as you're sleep deprived in the beginning. Overall these are nice and get the job done. I've purchased thes a couple times now and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: shayRN

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how these got so many wonderful reviews. Nine times out of 10 the ziplock ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how these got so many wonderful reviews. Nine times out of 10 the perforated top portion does not easily open at all and it ends up opening the bag on the outside of the ziplock, either wasting the entire bag or leaking out all of the milk! Same issue opening the ziplock again to use the thawed milk. So disappointed! Frozen bags are not starting to leak. I requested a return June 2017 and have not heard anything back.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great BPA/BPS product for a great pice
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I was on the hunt for bags that were BPA AND BPS free that wouldn't leak and these serve that exact purpose. They are easy to use, seal well and the price is totally reasonable. My only complaint is that there isn't a line to write how many ounces of milk are in each bag (although it's not a huge deal because you can just write it after the name or date). The non-toxic marker was a nice bonus as well. Great product, I would recommend to moms who want a safe plastic for storing their breast milk.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria F

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Bags
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research, we bought these storage bags for breastmilk because they are BPA and BPS free - the bags we were using were not. It is also nice that these come with the non-toxic marker and have good measuring lines on them too. These are very easy to pour the milk out after unthawing too without having it go everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: GoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: These definitely feel thicker and more durable than other brands I’ve tried and I really like that about them. What I don’t like is how flimsy the top portion of the pouch is. For starters, it makes pouring milk into them directly from a bottle a pain because the edges fold in and you risk spilling milk everywhere. It also makes organizing them difficult because you can’t see the label fully because it’s curled in. I also don’t like that these don’t have a designated spot to write in how many ounces are in the bag because the lines on the outsides aren’t accurate at all. I honestly prefer the Medellin brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already opened upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these bags on a few occasions and would normally have a five star rating. However, my most recent order of sterile bags arrived already opened. Not just the box, but the actualy bag containing the bags. I am assuming this was a return in it's past live. I will reorder but wanted to atleast give people a heads up to inspect thoroughly before using.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because I was looking for an American made product and their site pushes the fact that it's a small American business but these are made in China. I know most things are made in China but they made such a big deal about supporting American small businesses. Besides that these are equivalent to the milkies brand. Good quality but maybe a pinch thinner so they don't fill as easy sometimes. I don't see anything particularly better than others.
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: We love these bags
customer_reviews.text: We love these bags! Our sitter likes them too! The only problem is sometimes the serrations on the top to rip open the bag are not all the way through the bag, so it makes it hard to tear open. It’s only been in certain lots of the product I’ve received. Otherwise- we love the bags and the pens. Very easy to warm up breast milk/unused formula in the fridge. When breast milk is frozen, the bag also holds (I’ve had other brands rip from being brittle after being frozen.)
customer_reviews.author: Sean McKillop

customer_reviews.title: Best breastmilk bags!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the Medela bags previously so I'm only comparing to those. The Medela bags are smaller. I can easily fit 7 oz in the Bonafide bags. The double zip is great, no leaks! I thought the attachment to pump holes on Medela bags would be convenient but it's actually easier to pump into Medela bottle and just pour into Bonafide bags. Also these are made of softer material not crunchy like the Medela bags and very easy to pour from! On my 2nd box of these...the best!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and was disappointed that the bags kept leaking. However, the company reached out to me and offered a replacement box. I tried several bags from the replacement box and had no problem at all. That's when I realized I had a box of defective bags. For this reason, I am updating my review, giving 5 stars for a great product, but also for great customer service from the company. Besides, it feels good to support a small family business.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are FANTASTIC! I EP (so I've used a ton of them) and these are the only ones that haven't leaked. They're super thick and sturdy. I've had zero problems with them. They stand up, if that's your preference, but because of the shape necessary to allow that, they do not freeze flat. I was a little disappointed by that when I purchased these the first time, but I quickly looked past it. The odd shape is worth not having wasted milk. I cannot recommend these enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Colvin

customer_reviews.title: USA business, Product not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. Returned the product. It is and will always be important to my wife and I to use non-Chinese products for our baby (children). Maybe I should have read closer BUT this product is made in China not the US. Sure it might be a family business from the US but the product isn't.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to pour!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - these are thick/durable, stand up really well for easy pouring, and seal very securely. Huge con - it is CRAZY HARD to pour out of them. I end up spilling milk because some goes the outside of the bag while the rest pours out in a stream. I've wasted too much breast milk with these to use them any more. Will be using Dr. Brown's from now on.... seems to be the best combo of durability - pourability - and price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: When pouring spills everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I'm finally using my frozen milk with these bags and they suck, the ziplock part is so flimsy that it can't pour into the bottle without spilling everywhere. The top part always folds in and the plastic is so soft that it's hard to pour with one hand and hold the baby, ended up buying a different brand and that bag is tough and stiff and the ziplock is not flimsy so it's so easy to pour into the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: AUTUMN KEANU

customer_reviews.title: NO  PLASTIC SMELL/ UPDATE: switching to a different bag
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this bag is that there is no plastic smell and it seals up just fine. However, I hate that I have to cut a slit in the top of the bag to use my pump which makes these bags very inconvenient. I also dislike how difficult it is to pour milk out of the bag. The flaps at the top are very thin and once you open the bag, it curls up making it difficult to pour without spilling. For that reason, I will switch to a different milk storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: NaAXT

customer_reviews.title: Freezes well on its side
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite milk bags. You get the most bags for the cheapest price that I could find. They hold up well, keep milk in, and freeze nicely when laid on its side. All the things on my criteria list.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Messy pour- don’t lose all the liquid gold I did!
customer_reviews.text: Good luck pouring the milk out and not losing half of it. The closure works well but you have to pop out the bottom for it to stand on its own which is just another step.
customer_reviews.author: REAL REVIEW...

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these bags. I read many different reviews before choosing this one. The bags came wrinkled to the are hard to freeze flat and to squeeze air out of at the top. They also seem smaller than the previous brand I bought. I won’t order them again. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Pink Tulip

customer_reviews.title: Bomb Bags for Bomb Breastmilk :)
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the only products on Amazon that I've bought multiple times AND gifted to other breastfeeding mamas. The quality is AMAZING and you can store well over 6 oz of milk in these babies. The cost is WAY better than any of the other name brand breastmilk storage bags and the fact that these are BPA/BPS -free gives me a peace of mind. If you are considering buying these, wait no longer, GET THESE, they are worth every darn penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Tedford

customer_reviews.title: No leaks! Thick bags that lay flat!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best storage bags I’ve used! I used lansinoh when my son and they leaked so bad when thawing them out. The bonafide baby do not leak and they’re a thicker bag. I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I acquired 2 boxes of these from my sister before ...
customer_reviews.text: I acquired 2 boxes of these from my sister before I had my 6 month old (her son is 19 months, so they were apx. 19 months old). The bags did have some issues with the top of the bag tearing unevenly, as I have read in some previous reviews. The new box that I purchased does no have this same issue. I've used half a box, and not one excessive/uneven tear. Also, these bags have not ever leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bags. I find the labeling to be easy and clear to do (and that they include the marker is nice!). I also find the bags to be easy to pour into. I don't set them on a table and pour--I do hold them open with one hand and pour with the other. But the opening is wide enough and easy to do. I like that they can also freeze flat, to save space. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hietpas

customer_reviews.title: Durable bags, measurements not accurate though
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags, they have never leaked on me however they aren't very accurate. This hasn't been a big issue for me. I always measure myself and write the ounces down anyways on top of the bag but definitely Do NOT trust the bags measurements.
customer_reviews.author: 🌺 DizzyMissLizzy 🌺

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. No leaks and I love the look and that you can write on them (love the included marker). Also, the measurements always seem to be right once you stand the bag and fill it up correctly. Definitely recommend. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these bags for a few weeks now and really like them. They are thick a very sturdy. I was a bit sceptical that the opening would be too small and it would be difficult to pour into, but it's perfect. I haven't had any problems getting the top to tear open like some reviewers said. However you do have to be careful as you tear off the top because sometimes it deviates from the perforation. But as long as you tear slowly it's fine. I will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality, never had a leak
customer_reviews.text: good quality, never had a leak. but did not freeze as flat as the bags i had previously used.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: Bags are good for storing milk. But if I add 4 or 6 oz in the bags, they are fat & mostly full compared to the Lansinoh storage bags. When freezing, it takes up more space due to how far the bags are.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The breast milk bags are wonderful . They are sturdy and super duper great quality for the price paid ... I have yet to defrost any of my bags. But so far so good with filling them up and putting in freezer :)
customer_reviews.author: Nona ParkerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I really like how thick the bags are
customer_reviews.text: I really like how thick the bags are, how they easily lay flat for easy freezer storage, and how easy it is to get liquids in and out of them. I also like that there is a label at the top where you can write the details. I will say the only negative part of the bags is that the ounces read far differently than they do in the bottle but I just write how many ounces up top on the label.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome! They freeze nicely and thaw without any leaks! The included marker is a nice plus too! The only thing I have to complain about is that flaps getting in the way of pouring. But other than that they are awesome! Just purchased them for a 2nd time.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Thick material but bulky
customer_reviews.text: The material is thick and you don't have to worry about leakage when you thaw tmyitr milk. My only complaint is they are bulky and don't lay flat well. When you are tight on storage pace, you want them to be flat and be as compact as possible, these bags take up a lot of space. For that reason, I went back to using Lansinoh.
customer_reviews.author: Peony B.

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying milk bags. The first brand is no longer available. So i tried this brand. So far they are good. I have only used one and it doesn't leak. Holds a lot of milk. I haven't defrosted it yet but they seem good.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. The way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Came on time, seller personally contacted me to ensure I got the item and I was satisfied. Sanitized, secure for no leaking and the measurements on the side prove helpful. Milk goes in easy, seal is strong and when reheated can be poured out with no mess. I feel confident the milk will stay fresh and clean in the freezer with these bags. Very satisfied and I will continue to use them and re-purchase as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Cannot pour milk easily out of bags
customer_reviews.text: Why bother making an awesome large and oversized breast milk storage bag with flimsy top slaps that do not allow you to very easily pour milk out of the bags. Hence the low rating. They don't leak and they do store lot of milk but you cannot for milk into bottles Without Really separating the flaps and being very very careful. Completely ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Camden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Soooo happy with these bags
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Soooo happy with these bags. My lansinoh bags leaked after they had been de thawed from the freezer. I could tell right away that the quality of these were much better. The plastic is thicker and the zipper seems much sturdier! They have not leaked a bit which is soooo important for breastfeeding mothers. PLUS the marker they give with the bags is a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the other brands
customer_reviews.text: I do not care for these. They have a tight opening and strong zipper but are not easy to pour into or out of. Had to buy a funnel to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin G

customer_reviews.title: I trust this brand the most
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these bags. They are thick, thank goodness because I drop them a lot. The bags Are empty, clean, sterile and I very much trust them. I'm proud to support a USA made product. Thank you for keeping a chemical free product.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferMina

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for milk storage!
customer_reviews.text: So far really like these breast milk storage bags!! No leaks and easy to fill and pour. The ounce measurements on the bags are not accurate so that is a little annoying. For the price I'm happy with the quality and will keep using.
customer_reviews.author: NW_Living

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are easy to rip open (the little ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 8 months old now and I've purchased these bags multiple times. I love that they are easy to rip open (the little things when you are pumping and storing at work and have a million things going on) and that the base opens wide so that they will stand on their own in the refrigerator. I've dropped bags a few times and the bag has held up and not spilled. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Nathans

customer_reviews.title: I like the nuk bags better
customer_reviews.text: You cannot put 6 ounces in these bags. When you try to remove the air from the bag, breastmilk gets everywhere. I like the nuk bags better. I do really enjoy the pen and the tear off strip on the bag though. Also when you freeze them the top curls so you cannot read the date and time on them unless you unroll the top tab..
customer_reviews.author: Pyzik

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like these at first
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these at first. awkward to pour in the bottle. Now I like these over the nuk's . you can shake these good and get all the milk fat mixed before you pour it in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: cart tart

customer_reviews.title: Good value and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags, they work great to freeze breastmilk and keep things organized by oldest to newest pumped milk in the freezer. I have overfilled them and there have not been issues with the bag breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great bags! Much better than Modela bags
customer_reviews.text: Great bags! Much better than Modela bags! I like that it comes with a marker. The only thing I think the company should keep off the perforated plastic top when ready to use a bag. Kind of a waste, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mashian

customer_reviews.title: Great bags- bonus food safe marker!
customer_reviews.text: These are easily some of the best bags for the price that I have used- and I've tried dozens of brands in the past 8 months! I've never had leak and the food safe marker is very handy. The measurements on the bag are not accurate, but I've yet to find a bag with accurate measurements so that wasn't a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these bags 3 times so far, but I will continue to buy them as long as I need bags to store my breast milk. My son is going to be 5 months old. I love these bags because they do not leak and they are easy to label. They come with a marker which is a perk. I donated 453 oz of milk recently and these bags made transportation easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had an issue with these bags. They’re very durable and never leak. The only issue is the measurement makes on the bag are inaccurate; however, I find that’s the case with all storage bags
customer_reviews.author: Emily Foy

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed and will go back to using the Dr
customer_reviews.text: These bags are thick, however they barely fit 6 oz in them and the opening is small so it makes it harder to pour the milk in them. I was disappointed and will go back to using the Dr. browns bags.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty material, but inaccurate measurements
customer_reviews.text: The quantity marked on the bags in ml/oz in inaccurate and off by about an ounce. I will be ordering a different brand for my next order.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Ray

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pour into and out of
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think these bags are a bit of a hassle. Above the ziplock is a flap for you to write the date and time and it was just in the way. It makes it harder to pour milk into and my husband had lot of spillage over the edges when pouring milk out. The only good things were the ziplock felt nice and sturdy we never had any leakage issues and it came with a marker to write.
customer_reviews.author: Sayaka Schell

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are a thicker bag than some I've used, and they seal well and easily. I've not had any issues with leaking like a couple of the other brands out there. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Best bags
customer_reviews.text: Best breast milk bags, very happy with durability and thickness of the bags
customer_reviews.author: Dollie

customer_reviews.title: Wish they didn't change the opening but will still buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. Never once had a leak. The 4-star is based off of my 3rd box purchased. I do not like the smaller opening at the top, it makes it very hard to pour in the pumped milk. However, I will still continue purchasing this brand because of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Snyder

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing storage bags
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing storage bags. A little pricey, so I use other brands but if money was not an object, these would be my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: Thick and flat in your freezer
customer_reviews.text: They are very thick (no leaks), and lay pretty flat which, which are really two most important things for me in a breastmilk bag. Will reorder once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These bags work great!! My son is 10 months old and I breast feed. I haven't had a single one of these bags leak yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Best milk bags I have found
customer_reviews.text: Best milk bags I have found. Only BPS free I could find and I love the addition of the nontoxic marker, I didn’t even think about that!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Ounces are off!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bags are durable and strong, and the whole marker coming with it is nice as well, but the ounces are WAY off!!!! And I don't like that!!! Once you put 3 ounces in....it reads as 6, and you can't fit anymore in there. I have to use up so many bags just to get to the right amount of milk for my lil baby. I will not be purchasing these again....
customer_reviews.author: Karion Banks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good value!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice thick bags, wide sealed seems, sturdy double zipper closure, you can feel it "snap" closed and be sure your liquid gold is secure. I've frozen and thawed around 1/2 a box now, not a single drop has been lost! Will definitely reorder in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags. Loved them so much more than the major brands.
customer_reviews.author: Joco230

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried all the bags and these are definitely the best!! Thick and the double zip is the peace of mind I need to ensure no leaking. I’ve been using these for 8 months and very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Haumschild

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only storage bags I use, HOWEVER, do not go by the measurements on the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Reb

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, but not easy to pour.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality thickness. Seals well no leaks! Hard to pour out with the extra long tip pieces and the sealer in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags !!! They are durable like medela with a better price tag than lanishoh (idk spellinof that brand but you pumping moms know what I'm talking about). They don't melt in the bottle warmers and they are AFFORDABLE. love the marker they come with too !! I'm always losing mine so just clip it to the box of these bags. Seriously great job guys !!!
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: These bags have been great for storing breast milk
customer_reviews.text: These bags have been great for storing breast milk. Haven’t had any problems with pouring milk in and the marker providesd is great. It’s also nice to know that these can be recycled and you don’t have to worry about creating more trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Best bags. Ive been using Medela and these bags are so much better. I can actually put 6oz in, it closes and freezes! Medela are marked for 5 oz but you can barely close them let alone freeze them. The marker it comes with is very handy. Great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Symington

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy that I made my decision on trying this product
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on other brands' breastmilk storage bags before I purchased this. I'm so happy that I made my decision on trying this product. After testing these bags for two months, I'm totally satisfied with them. The bags are durable and strong so they hold the breastmilk safely without leaking. Their pen is useful and thoughtful! One main concern is the price which is a little bit pricey. Overall, it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Only complaint is that they are hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Only complaint is that they are hard to pour. To solve that problem I cut off the top part to just above the seal. This makes it more accurate and I'm not spilling any milk.
customer_reviews.author: JLew

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding good quality bags, these ones were the best I had used. Not a single drip.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cole

customer_reviews.title: I love a free pen!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so bummed these are no longer available! I really liked these bags. Great value, no leaking and came with a pen. I hope it come back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Storage bags are so expensive but these are a great value. Although I'm not a fan of how stiff they are. I can't use them directly with my pump.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a good material, but smaller than other bags. The shape of the bags make them hard to get flat to freeze and store.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: I really appreciate the fact that these are both bpa ...
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the fact that these are both bpa and bps free. With that being said, the opening to the bag is a bit small. It's hard to pour milk in and out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are pretty great. I have yet to have a leak, the little measurement lines seem to be fairly accurate, and they haven't left a smell of any sort. I will gladly purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: CarmenAustin

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bags! High quality, stand on their own and hold a good amount of milk. I have a good milk supply and don't want to use 3 bsgs to store all my milk from one pumping session, it's expensive! I can easily store 6-7, even 8 oz if im really pushing it into these bags! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Wuollet

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. Never had one leak and they’re easy to lay flat for storage. I love how it comes with a marker so I don’t have to worry about toxins getting into my milk from other markers. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JR1986

customer_reviews.title: Ok bags.
customer_reviews.text: Bags are ok. Flimsy. Markers didn’t work. They even sent new markers which didn’t work either.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to use with a strong seal. Love these bags!!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could want
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, American made, and comes with a marker! What else can you ask for
customer_reviews.author: Lauren N F Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bags! Highly recommended. They are super sturdy and thick and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: tifany

customer_reviews.title: Bags are nice and thick but
customer_reviews.text: Bags are nice and thick but... the downsides are that the top part where you write date/time/name curls when frozen, there isn't a place for ounce (can just write it on one of the lines provided), and the bottom part is hard to separate when trying to put the bag upright. Will likely go back to Medela bags....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far the best quality bags out there
customer_reviews.text: By far the best quality bags out there. They don't rip, or tear after being frozen like the cheaper bags do.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I trust these entirely and I really like the fact that it comes with a non-toxic pen
customer_reviews.text: High quality, thick bags. I trust these entirely and I really like the fact that it comes with a non-toxic pen. A+
customer_reviews.author: KATE LEVITTA

customer_reviews.title: No leaks
customer_reviews.text: I just reordered these bags. Never had any leak or any other issues. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: These have been great so far
customer_reviews.text: These have been great so far. Only critique is that the very top perforated strip rips off too easily and often takes 1/2 of the top of the bag with it. Otherwise, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa McHugh

customer_reviews.title: love love these bags
customer_reviews.text: love love these bags! The qaulity is amazing! They are a bit pricey but I they are so much better than the other bags that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best nag for your money!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bags! I have tried many brands and have NEVER had these leak! They are my far my favorite and are better than the more expensive brands! I like that they have the perforated top so I know they are clean! The marker is a great touch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great bags for storage and for using after defrosting! I had others that had bust while freezing and have never had issues with these.
customer_reviews.author: BulldogMommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great as waterproof storage sleeves for smaller cellphones, too.
customer_reviews.author: David Norman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, large bags. I use them to store almost two bottles worth of milk!
customer_reviews.author: Dexter23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love these breastmilk bags and the cute marker that comes with it! Helping me build up a freezer stash to donate.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than medela. We have not had a leak yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

product_meta.title: Breastmilk Storage Bags - 110 Bag Count - BPA and BPS-Free - Nontoxic Marker Included
product_meta.description: NEW IMPROVED BREAST MILK STORAGE BAGS FROM BONAFIDE BABY. More bags than the standard 50 and 100 count alternatives along with a free non-toxic marker for easier freshness tracking we've delivered on value while not sacrificing on quality and safety. DEVELOPED BY A MOM FOR MOMS! We know you want quality value and of course the safest products for your baby. That's why our bags were developed by a mom for moms. We also listened to all our customers who requested more ease-of-use for the perforated tear off top – you asked we delivered! Each bag has upgraded freezer safe assurance with improved double seals to prevent leaks. Remember our bags are BPA BPS free CPSIA compliant latex free and pre-sterilized for your little one's safety. And unlike some major brands every bag contains a removable safety seal for your peace of mind. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED OR YOUR MONEY BACK! All of our products are backed by a 100 money back satisfaction guarantee. If for any reason you aren't satisfied simply contact us for a full refund your purchase price period! CLICK THE ADD TO CART BUTTON NOW AND ORDER WITH NO RISK!!
feature_bullets: NEW IMPROVED DESIGN FEATURES – Superior Leak Protection with improved double zip seal upgraded freezer burn resistant for safe & cooler storage New customer-requested easy-to-use perforated tear-off top Total bag count increased to 110 bags per box Containers have proved to be an excellent solution to most refrigerator and freezer supply storage 110 pack supply is easy to tote with additional nursing supplies

BPA BPS FREE CPSIA COMPLIANT LATEX FREE SAFETY SEALED AND PRE-STERILIZED - Our sterilized bags are BPA BPS free CPSIA compliant latex free and have been pre-sterilized And unlike many of our competitors and some major brands they also come with a safety seal at the top of each and every one for your peace of mind and your baby's safety When it comes to your breastmilk container & collection accessories there is no need to settle for less

FREE NON-TOXIC MARKER INCLUDED - Save time and money searching for a nontoxic marker We've already included one in each package to keep track of freshness by writing on the designated date tab attached to each bag in order to facilitate simple & proper labeling of each pouch without having to find a pen that doesn't create the worry of possible toxic contamination or any variety of health concerns from an unknown ink ingredient Parents are always telling us that the marker is the best addition

EASY POUR SPOUT - Each bag is notched on both sides of the opening making it a breeze to pour into your baby's bottle and eliminating possible milk loss and spills Each bag will stand upright when filled or lay on its side for easy refrigeration or freezing These ' Mommy knows best ' details are the result of answering the wishes of customers like you and allow for easy at home or away convenient & efficient usage

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – 100 Percent Unlimited Satisfaction Guaranteed for your convenience Your purchase is always fully protected with this superior customer service feature Our guarantee will ensure your solid confidence in each product purchase no questions asked Our customer promise will also prevent any post purchase regret as we will always honor full refund requests our customers may want regardless of reason for total peace of mind
